content: इंदुः [उनत्ति क्लेदयति चंद्रिकया भुवनं उंद्-उ आदेरिच्च <ls>Uṇ. 1. 12</ls>] {@--1@} The moon; दिलीप इति राजेंदुरिंदुः क्षीरनिधाविव <ls>R. 1. 12</ls> (इंदु is said to mean in the Veda a drop of Soma juice, a bright drop or spark; सुतास इंदवः <ls>Rv. 1. 16. 6</ls>). {@--2@} The मृगशिरस् Nakṣatra. {@--3@} (In <ab>Math.</ab>) The number ‘one’. {@--4@} Camphor. --(<ab>pl.</ab>) {@--1@} The periodical changes of the moon. {@--2@} The time of moonlight, night.
